channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boeing’s new CEO says the company will be ‘iconic’ again—even after losing more than $6 billion last quarter
item.description: CEO Kelly Ortberg outlined “fundamental” changes to the aircraft manufacturer ahead of Wednesday’s earnings.

item.title: There are good reasons for couples to keep their finances separate, experts say
item.description: "We’re shifting more toward a world where it’s more common and comfortable to not join finances, and that’s okay."

item.title: What CIOs and other tech leaders are prioritizing as they plan their 2025 budgets
item.description: Artificial intelligence is at the top of the list for what tech leaders are planning to spend on in 2025.

item.title: These healthcare stocks could rally if Harris wins — or drop if Trump triumphs
Apple releases new preview of its AI, including ChatGPT integration
item.description: Apple on Wednesday released a beta version of a slew of Apple Intelligence features, including its long-awaited ChatGPT integration.

item.title: CDC told McDonald's about potential E. coli outbreak late last week
item.description: Roughly a fifth of McDonald's U.S. restaurants are not selling Quarter Pounder burgers at this time.

item.title: BMO Capital Markets names stocks to play in either presidential election outcome
item.description: The firm listed ideas if either Kamala Harris or Donald Trump wins the November matchup.

item.title: Apple CEO Tim Cook didn’t know you could name group chats on your iPhone
item.description: Cook has been CEO of Apple for more than a decade.

item.title: Budget watchdog: No way to predict timing of a U.S. fiscal crisis
Abercrombie & Fitch responds to former CEO's sex trafficking arrest, says it will cooperate
item.description: Abercrom,bie & Fitch said that it will cooperate with law enforcement after its former CEO Mike Jeffries was arrested on sex trafficking and related c...

item.title: Existing-home sales sink to a 14-year low, as home buyers pull back
Are U.S. stocks really headed for a ‘lost decade’? Why one strategist disagrees.
Student demand for an MBA is surging—but that might be bad news for the U.S. economy
item.description: An overwhelming majority of full-time MBA programs experienced application growth but that means students are worried about the job market.

item.title: Harris blasts Trump on reported Hitler comments, says 'he wants unchecked power'
item.description: Kamala Harris addressed comments by John Kelly that Donald Trump praised Adolf Hitler. Kelly said Trump met the definition of a fascist.

item.title: Biden administration to award nearly $250 million to develop affordable housing
